description: Displays the tags associated with an EventBridge resource. In EventBridge, rules and event buses can be tagged.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The ARN of the EventBridge resource for which you want to view tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of tag keys and values associated with the resource you specified.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A string you can use to assign a value. The combination of tag keys and values can help you organize and categorize your resources.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for the specified tag key.
